Name: Aim
Description: On next turn, increase Range by one, and may target a hit location without penalty. Firing or moving cancel the benefit. Cannot be combined with Rapid or Burst Fire.

Name: Attack
Description: Make a Test to try to hit a target.

Name: Charge
Description: Move as far as your Speed allows and make a melee attack with Advantage. Can't charge a target in your Zone. You gain Disadvantage on Melee and Reflexes Tests to defend until your next turn.

Name: Defend
Description: Choose an ally in Immediate Range. Until your next turn, redirects attacks from your ally to yourself. Alternatively, defend your current Zone from one other Zone to deny entry if reasonably feasible.

Name: Disengage
Description: Move beyond Immediate Range without incurring a free Attack.

Name: Dodge
Description: Until your next turn, gain Advantage on the next Melee or Reflexes (Dodge) Test to defend yourself. Gain an additional Reflexes (Dodge) Test to avoid ranged attacks without using reaction.

Name: Flee
Description: Spend both Action and Move to escape the battle.

Name: Grapple
Description: Make an Athletics (Might) or Melee (Brawling) Test opposed to target's Athletics (Might), Melee (Brawling) or Reflexes (Dodge). If you succeed, target is Restrained.

Name: Help
Description: Assist an ally on their next Test, granting them Advantage.

Name: Hide
Description: Make a Stealth Test to conceal yourself using a suitable element of the environment. Finding the character necessitates a greater SL on an Awareness Test than what was achieved on the Stealth Test.

Name: Improvise
Description: Improvise an Action. GM determines if Action is possible and if a Test is needed.

Name: Manifest
Description: Manifest a Psychic Power.

Name: Overwatch
Description: Prepare for a specific event. Declare a trigger and the Action you will take. If the trigger doesn't happen this turn, take a different Action acting last in the Initiative order.

Name: Reload
Description: Reload a Weapon.

Name: Retreat
Description: Use your turn to prepare a safe Retreat. Any party member may also use the Retreat action on their turn to join the Retreat.

Name: Run
Description: Allows movement to an adjacent Zone. Can be used alongside standard Move.

Name: Search
Description: Take time to examine your surroundings with an Awareness (Sight) Test.

Name: Seize the Initiative
Description: Give up this Turn's action to go to the top of the Initiative order.

Name: Shove
Description: Choose a target within Immediate Range. Make an Athletics (Might) Test opposed by the target's Athletics (Might) or Dodge (Reflexes). Shove the target by SL numbers. You are no longer Engaged with them. If 3 or more SL, may Shove target to an Adjacent Zone.

Name: Take Cover
Description: Take cover against ranged attacks in a Zone with the Cover Trait. Light Cover provides +2 Armour, Medium Cover provides +4 Armour, Heavy Cover provides +6 Armour.

Name: Target Location
Description: Choose a Target's Hit Location. Make an attack with Disadvantage. On a success, hit chosen location. Can be used to ignore Cover.

Name: Use an Object or Feature
Description: Activate a Zone Feature or interact with a complex object.
